message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000.  I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,200. This offer reflects the value this product will bring you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13,200 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $12,500. Can you consider that?
